topic.title: Enabling a Disabled Virtual Host Domain
topic.p: System administrators are the only users who can enable a disabled Virtual Host Domain account.

ol.title: To enable a disabled Virtual Host Domain:

li.p: In the Domain Management menu group, click Domain List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: In the Actions column, click enable for the domain you want to enable. The window refreshes with a message informing you that the domain has been enabled. The word "enabled" appears in the Status column for that domain.
